name: FULLY CUSTOM invites
description:
completely your own, we will make wedding invitations that fit your vision and colors, designed just for you!

price includes single-sided save the date cards, formal invitations and single-sided RSVP cards.

other options and additions available such as enclosure cards, belly bands, wedding programs and more. 

please contact me for a detailed price sheet.

initial deposit of 50% is due after confirmation of final proofs.

name: FULLY CUSTOM stamps
description:
this stamp is yours from the first letter to the last.

have a sweet saying that you want to include on the back of every letter that you send? an inside joke between you and your love? the options are endless with dimensions and possibilities. we can work together to make something all your own - just for your snail mail or love notes.

price begins at $75 - but will vary depending on the dimensions and amount of hand-lettering involved.

please don't hesitate to contact me to start working on your idea!

name: FULLY CUSTOM programs
description:
it's your stationery, your ceremony and the people you love. 

taking a cue from your invitation suite, these programs will be created with all of your other stationery in mind and include all of those necessary details that you want to share with your guests.

ceremony music, words of thanks, honoring the memories of loved ones, sharing personal stories behind your bridal party, even maps and directions to your reception. working together, we will weave just the right elements together to make something your guests will want to hold onto.

the price reflects a starting point, but has the possibility for varying depending on details and printing methods.

contact me through the contact page or at madeinthefold[at]gmail[dot]com to get started on your idea.

name: CUSTOM DESIGNED save the dates
description:
need a save the date but can't seem to find the style you like? 

we can make just what you'd like to send your guests to let them know not to make any other plans on your big day!

price reflects design only/printing costs are extra
please contact me for a full price sheet

name: CUSTOM DESIGNED favor tags
description:
have just the right idea for your favors but can't find what you are looking for? 
we can design a tag with your wording for all of your guests to enjoy on your big day.

price reflects design only/printing costs are extra

please contact for a full price sheet
